{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Global Sun |model=WL AP 2454 NM |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/24/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O7J-WLAP2454-NM |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V643220CT-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} "WL AP 2454 NM0 B10 V1.0" and "WL AP 2454 NM0 V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report lists the following additional models as covered under this FCC ID... *Global Sun WL AP 2454 NM *AOpen AOI-882 *LevelOne WAP-9003 *Planet WAP-4010 *ORIGO WLL-3710M *Etherwan Systems EWA-0102-G *Topcom Skyr@cer AP 554G *TP-LINK TL-WA500 *Tenwell TW-AP54M
The default SSID may be '''default'''.
